name: Integration Telegram Bot, OpenAI (ChatGPT, Sora, DALL-E, Whisper)

messages.content:
Parse this expense message and return ONLY a JSON object with these fields:
- date (YYYY-MM-DD format, if not specified use today's date)
- amount (number only)
- category (e.g., Food, Transport, Shopping, etc.)
- description (brief description)

Message: {{2.message.text}}

Return only valid JSON, nothing else.
You are a expense parser. Always return valid JSON only, no explanations.

model.label: o4-mini (system)Fast, cost-efficient reasoning model, succeeded by GPT-5 mini

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.help:

You can test if your image is publicly accessible by opening the link in an incognito tab.
